review: Two words of advice for anyone viewing this product, buy it! This item looks and fits great and at $35, it's a steal.  Other Streaming devices can cost well upwards of $100 and the cheapest I've found is around $50.  I tried a vizio streaming player before ordering this and was very disappointed.  My complaints: tedious to use with the remote, required space on a shelf and it was fairly costly.  The chromecast solved all of these woes.  It's controlled by my iPhone which I set up in a matter of minutes, it plugs in to your HDMI port well out of sight and it is super cheap!I went into this with an expect the worst hope for the best attitude, since I didn't expect a great picture or good sound from such a small and cheap device.  I was wrong!  The picture is fantastic, but does take 10-15 seconds to buffer and focus into true HD.  it's a little blurry for those few seconds.  So what, right? I agree.BUY IT, you will love it.
